Summary: Round bright white circle at 5:30am moving slowly to the west.
divs: sighting detailsi was up at about 5am walked outside and after getting the dairy ready i started to put feed in our bins for the day and i looked up and saw this big bright white circle light moving to the west really slow and finally dissapeard after about 4 or 5 min or so, i am also a paranormal investagator. thanks *(name deleted--sgonzalez\cms) and i did not have my camcorder did not have enough time to get back to the house, it would have been gone then.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Harrison
There were no other sightings in Harrison on or around June 27th 2010
